definition: to lump different matters together (idiom)
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
old variant of 概[gai4]
general/approximate
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

sentences.english: Any general claim will be belied by a particular experience.
sentences.chinese: 任何一概而论的说法都会被具体经历推翻。

sentences.english: But I believe that is no longer universally true.
sentences.chinese: 但我认为不能再一概而论的了。

sentences.english: Of course, the people of the Middle East are not a singular "them.
sentences.chinese: 当然，中东的人口不能用“他们”一词一概而论。

sentences.english: Condyloma acuminatum treatment costs can not be generalized.
sentences.chinese: 尖锐湿疣治疗费用不能一概而论。

definition: (lit.) to take a part for the whole/to generalize
to deal a single fatal blow/(fig.) to totally repudiate sb because of a minor error
manifold diversity
varying from person to person (idiom); different for each individual
unilateral/one-sided
biased/partial
current state/current situation
general/broad/sweeping/lacking in detail/vague
to confuse one thing with another (idiom); to muddle
to jump to an unfounded conclusion
to distinguish (between different things)/to make distinctions clear
opinions differ (idiom)
overall character
good or bad/good and bad/standard/quality
lit. not eating for fear of choking (idiom); fig. to cut off one's nose to spite one's face/to avoid sth essential because of a slight risk
to have nothing in common with each other (idiom)
